DOC.brief_summary: Many anesthesiologist use Remifentanil reduce surgical pain stabilize vital sign . However , drug induce postoperative hyperalgesia . Nowadays , many study report low-dose Ketamine prevents opioid-induces hyperalgesia . Nefopam , non-opioid analgesic , similar mechanism Ketamine . It helpful postoperative pain control , reduce need opioid .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intraoperative Nefopam Acute Pain After Remifentanil Based Anesthesia
